alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern De Soto Parish, eastern Panola, southeastern Rusk, northeastern Nacogdoches, Shelby and northwestern San Augustine Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Martinsville, or 15 miles northeast of Nacogdoches, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Center, Logansport, Tenaha, Timpson, Garrison, Joaquin, Deberry, Martinsville, Neuville, Shelbyville, Huxley, Gary City, Longstreet, Stanley, Jericho, Front, Stockman, Midyett and Deadwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
